mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_FILE_ID, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, SAVED_FILE_PATH_NAME FROM FREEBOARD_FILE WHERE BOARD_ID=#{boardId}

SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_REPLY_ID, MEM_ID, BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT, BOARD_REPLY_LOG_IP, BOARD_REPLY_LEVEL, BOARD_REPLY_REF, BOARD_REPLY_STEP FROM BOARD_REPLY WHERE BOARD_ID=#{boardId} ORDER BY BOARD_REPLY_REF DESC, BOARD_REPLY_STEP
SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(WRITE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') WRITE_TIME, MEM_ID, READ_COUNT FROM FREEBOARD ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC

SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(WRITE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'), MEM_ID, READ_COUNT FROM (SELECT T1.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, WRITE_TIME, MEM_ID, READ_COUNT FROM FREEBOARD ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC) T1) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRownum} AND #{endRownum}
SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, WRITE_TIME, READ_COUNT, READ_GOOD, MEM_ID FROM FREEBOARD
SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, WRITE_TIME, READ_COUNT, READ_GOOD, MEM_ID FROM FREEBOARD WHERE BOARD_ID=#{boardId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL INTO FREEBOARD (BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, WRITE_TIME, MEM_ID, READ_COUNT, READ_GOOD) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_ID.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, default, #{memId}, default, default)
INTO FREEBOARD_FILE (BOARD_ID, BOARD_FILE_ID, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, SAVED_FILE_PATH_NAME) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_ID.NEXTVAL, #{idx}, #{filedto.filePath}, #{filedto.orginalFileName})
SELECT * FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO BOARD_REPLY VALUES (SELECT NVL(MAX(BOARD_REPLY_ID),0)+1 FROM BOARD_REPLY), #{boardId}, #{memId}, #{boardReplyContent}, DEFAULT, NULL, DEFAULT, (SELECT NVL(MAX(BOARD_REPLY_ID),0)+1 FROM BOARD_REPLY), DEFAULT)

INSERT INTO BOARD_REPLY VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(BOARD_REPLY_ID),0)+1 FROM BOARD_REPLY), #{boardId}, #{memId}, #{boardReplyContent} , DEFAULT , NULL, (SELECT BOARD_REPLY_LEVEL+1 FROM BOARD_REPLY WHERE BOARD_REPLY_ID = #{boardReplyId} ), (SELECT BOARD_REPLY_REF FROM BOARD_REPLY WHERE BOARD_REPLY_ID = #{boardReplyId} ), (SELECT BOARD_REPLY_STEP+1 FROM BOARD_REPLY WHERE BOARD_REPLY_ID = #{boardReplyId} ))
mapper.update: UPDATE FREEBOARD SET BOARD_TITLE=#{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT=#{boardContent}, WRITE_TIME=default WHERE MEM_ID=#{boardId}
UPDATE FREEBOARD SET READ_COUNT=READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_ID=#{boardId}

UPDATE BOARD_REPLY SET BOARD_REPLY_STEP = BOARD_REPLY_STEP+1 WHERE BOARD_REPLY_REF = (SELECT BOARD_REPLY_REF FROM BOARD_REPLY WHERE BOARD_REPLY_ID = #{boardReplyId}) AND BOARD_REPLY_STEP > (SELECT BOARD_REPLY_STEP FROM BOARD_REPLY WHERE BOARD_REPLY_ID = #{boardReplyId})
